articles.author: Dana Hedgpeth, Sari Horwitz, Toluse Olorunnipa
articles.title: Biden set to apologize to Native Americans for Indian boarding schools - The Washington Post
articles.description: Joe Biden’s remarks would mark the first time a U.S. president formally apologized for the government’s role in separating Native children from their families.
articles.content: President Joe Biden plans to formally apologize Friday for the U.S. governments role in running hundreds of Indian boarding schools for a 150-year period that stripped Native American children of the… [+348 chars]
